description:
Montreal, March 10, 2014 - Python contributor Greg Ward explains how  using automated testing in a rigorous, disciplined way will not merely help you to write more correct code, but will also make you a better programmer.

* PyCon Replay: http://youtu.be/ArLf03-RLwU
* Greg: http://sflx.ca/gward
* MP44: http://sflx.ca/mp44e
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: Unit Testing Makes Your Code Better
